name: Freerunners Inc.
description:
Hey Traceurs,Freerunners Inc. is always looking for new talent and we only accept the best. Challenge yourself on the test course if you believe that's you! You'll have to go through the yellow checkpoints and eventually reach the red one to finish the run. Finding the fastest way is up to you; it could be vaulting over obstacles, sliding under them or evading them altogether by running on the walls.

The game is currently in an early prototype phase with several features yet to be implemented. Some of these will be unlocked as we arrive at certain milestones together. With Your support you can help this project take off and reach new heights.
1. milestone : Online Leaderboard
2. milestone : Realtime multiplayer ( at least $500  support)
More coming up.

CONTROLS
WASD
SPACE - jump
Left Shift -Sprint
C- Crouch, slide
R - Respawn
ESC - Pause Menu

Feel free to share your ideas.
BE READY, BE FAST AND DON'T LOSE YOUR GRIP!
